verses.arabic: ٱقْتَرَبَتِ ٱلسَّاعَةُ وَٱنشَقَّ ٱلْقَمَرُ
verses.english: The Hour has drawn near and the moon was split ˹in two˺.<sup foot_note=77457>1</sup>

verses.arabic: وَإِن يَرَوْا۟ ءَايَةً يُعْرِضُوا۟ وَيَقُولُوا۟ سِحْرٌ مُّسْتَمِرٌّ
verses.english: Yet, whenever they see a sign, they turn away,<sup foot_note=77458>1</sup> saying, “Same old magic!”

verses.arabic: وَكَذَّبُوا۟ وَٱتَّبَعُوٓا۟ أَهْوَآءَهُمْ ۚ وَكُلُّ أَمْرٍ مُّسْتَقِرٌّ
verses.english: They rejected ˹the truth˺ and followed their own desires—and every matter will be settled—

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ جَآءَهُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَنۢبَآءِ مَا فِيهِ مُزْدَجَرٌ
verses.english: even though the stories ˹of destroyed nations˺ that have already come to them are a sufficient deterrent.

verses.arabic: حِكْمَةٌۢ بَـٰلِغَةٌ ۖ فَمَا تُغْنِ ٱلنُّذُرُ
verses.english: ˹This Quran is˺ profound ˹in˺ wisdom, but warnings are of no benefit ˹to them˺.

verses.arabic: فَتَوَلَّ عَنْهُمْ ۘ يَوْمَ يَدْعُ ٱلدَّاعِ إِلَىٰ شَىْءٍ نُّكُرٍ
verses.english: So turn away from them ˹O Prophet˺. ˹And wait for˺ the Day ˹when˺ the caller<sup foot_note=77459>1</sup> will summon ˹them˺ for something horrifying.<sup foot_note=77460>2</sup>

verses.arabic: خُشَّعًا أَبْصَـٰرُهُمْ يَخْرُجُونَ مِنَ ٱلْأَجْدَاثِ كَأَنَّهُمْ جَرَادٌ مُّنتَشِرٌ
verses.english: With eyes downcast, they will come forth from the graves as if they were swarming locusts,

verses.arabic: مُّهْطِعِينَ إِلَى ٱلدَّاعِ ۖ يَقُولُ ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ هَـٰذَا يَوْمٌ عَسِرٌ
verses.english: rushing towards the caller. The disbelievers will cry, “This is a difficult Day!”

verses.arabic: ۞ كَذَّبَتْ قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمُ نُوحٍ فَكَذَّبُوا۟ عَبْدَنَا وَقَالُوا۟ مَجْنُونٌ وَٱزْدُجِرَ
verses.english: Before them, the people of Noah denied ˹the truth˺ and rejected Our servant, calling ˹him˺ insane. And he was intimidated.

verses.arabic: فَدَعَا رَبَّهُۥٓ أَنِّى مَغْلُوبٌ فَٱنتَصِرْ
verses.english: So he cried out to his Lord, “I am helpless, so help ˹me˺!”

verses.arabic: فَفَتَحْنَآ أَبْوَٰبَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ بِمَآءٍ مُّنْهَمِرٍ
verses.english: So We opened the gates of the sky with pouring rain,

verses.arabic: وَفَجَّرْنَا ٱلْأَرْضَ عُيُونًا فَٱلْتَقَى ٱلْمَآءُ عَلَىٰٓ أَمْرٍ قَدْ قُدِرَ
verses.english: and caused the earth to burst with springs, so the waters met for a fate already set.

verses.arabic: وَحَمَلْنَـٰهُ عَلَىٰ ذَاتِ أَلْوَٰحٍ وَدُسُرٍ
verses.english: We carried him on that ˹Ark made˺ of planks and nails,

verses.arabic: تَجْرِى بِأَعْيُنِنَا جَزَآءً لِّمَن كَانَ كُفِرَ
verses.english: sailing under Our ˹watchful˺ Eyes—a ˹fair˺ punishment on behalf of the one ˹they˺ denied.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَد تَّرَكْنَـٰهَآ ءَايَةً فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
verses.english: We certainly left this<sup foot_note=77461>1</sup> as a sign. So is there anyone who will be mindful?

verses.arabic: فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِى وَنُذُرِ
verses.english: Then how ˹dreadful˺ were My punishment and warnings!

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا ٱلْقُرْءَانَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
verses.english: And We have certainly made the Quran easy to remember. So is there anyone who will be mindful?

verses.arabic: كَذَّبَتْ عَادٌ فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِى وَنُذُرِ
verses.english: ’Ȃd ˹also˺ rejected ˹the truth˺. Then how ˹dreadful˺ were My punishment and warnings!

verses.arabic: إِنَّآ أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ رِيحًا صَرْصَرًا فِى يَوْمِ نَحْسٍ مُّسْتَمِرٍّ
verses.english: Indeed, We sent against them a furious wind,<sup foot_note=77462>1</sup> on a day of unrelenting misery,

verses.arabic: تَنزِعُ ٱلنَّاسَ كَأَنَّهُمْ أَعْجَازُ نَخْلٍ مُّنقَعِرٍ
verses.english: that snatched people up, leaving them like trunks of uprooted palm trees.

verses.arabic: فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِى وَنُذُرِ
verses.english: Then how ˹dreadful˺ were My punishment and warnings!

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا ٱلْقُرْءَانَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
verses.english: And We have certainly made the Quran easy to remember. So is there anyone who will be mindful?

verses.arabic: كَذَّبَتْ ثَمُودُ بِٱلنُّذُرِ
verses.english: Thamûd rejected the warnings ˹as well˺,

verses.arabic: فَقَالُوٓا۟ أَبَشَرًا مِّنَّا وَٰحِدًا نَّتَّبِعُهُۥٓ إِنَّآ إِذًا لَّفِى ضَلَـٰلٍ وَسُعُرٍ
verses.english: arguing, “How can we follow one ˹average˺ human being from among us? We would then truly be misguided and insane.

verses.arabic: أَءُلْقِىَ ٱلذِّكْرُ عَلَيْهِ مِنۢ بَيْنِنَا بَلْ هُوَ كَذَّابٌ أَشِرٌ
verses.english: Has the revelation been sent down ˹only˺ to him out of ˹all of˺ us? In fact, he is a boastful liar.”

verses.arabic: سَيَعْلَمُونَ غَدًا مَّنِ ٱلْكَذَّابُ ٱلْأَشِرُ
verses.english: ˹It was revealed to Ṣâliḥ,˺ “They will soon know who the boastful liar is.

verses.arabic: إِنَّا مُرْسِلُوا۟ ٱلنَّاقَةِ فِتْنَةً لَّهُمْ فَٱرْتَقِبْهُمْ وَٱصْطَبِرْ
verses.english: We are sending the she-camel as a test for them. So watch them ˹closely˺, and have patience.

verses.arabic: وَنَبِّئْهُمْ أَنَّ ٱلْمَآءَ قِسْمَةٌۢ بَيْنَهُمْ ۖ كُلُّ شِرْبٍ مُّحْتَضَرٌ
verses.english: And tell them that the ˹drinking˺ water must be divided between them ˹and her˺, each taking a turn to drink ˹every other day˺.”

verses.arabic: فَنَادَوْا۟ صَاحِبَهُمْ فَتَعَاطَىٰ فَعَقَرَ
verses.english: But they roused a companion of theirs, so he dared to kill ˹her˺.

verses.arabic: فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِى وَنُذُرِ
verses.english: Then how ˹dreadful˺ were My punishment and warnings!

verses.arabic: إِنَّآ أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ صَيْحَةً وَٰحِدَةً فَكَانُوا۟ كَهَشِيمِ ٱلْمُحْتَظِرِ
verses.english: Indeed, We sent against them ˹only˺ one ˹mighty˺ blast, leaving them like the twigs of fence-builders.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا ٱلْقُرْءَانَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
verses.english: And We have certainly made the Quran easy to remember. So is there anyone who will be mindful?

verses.arabic: كَذَّبَتْ قَوْمُ لُوطٍۭ بِٱلنُّذُرِ
verses.english: The people of Lot ˹also˺ rejected the warnings.

verses.arabic: إِنَّآ أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ حَاصِبًا إِلَّآ ءَالَ لُوطٍ ۖ نَّجَّيْنَـٰهُم بِسَحَرٍ
verses.english: We unleashed upon them a storm of stones. As for ˹the believers of˺ Lot’s family, We delivered them before dawn

verses.arabic: نِّعْمَةً مِّنْ عِندِنَا ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى مَن شَكَرَ
verses.english: as a blessing from Us. This is how We reward whoever gives thanks.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ أَنذَرَهُم بَطْشَتَنَا فَتَمَارَوْا۟ بِٱلنُّذُرِ
verses.english: He had already warned them of Our ˹crushing˺ blow but they disputed the warnings.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ رَٰوَدُوهُ عَن ضَيْفِهِۦ فَطَمَسْنَآ أَعْيُنَهُمْ فَذُوقُوا۟ عَذَابِى وَنُذُرِ
verses.english: And they even demanded his angel-guests from him,<sup foot_note=77463>1</sup> so We blinded their eyes. ˹And they were told,˺ “Taste then My punishment and warnings!”

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ صَبَّحَهُم بُكْرَةً عَذَابٌ مُّسْتَقِرٌّ
verses.english: And indeed, by the early morning they were overwhelmed by an unrelenting torment.

verses.arabic: فَذُوقُوا۟ عَذَابِى وَنُذُرِ
verses.english: ˹Again they were told,˺ “Taste now My punishment and warnings!”

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا ٱلْقُرْءَانَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
verses.english: And We have certainly made the Quran easy to remember. So is there anyone who will be mindful?

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ جَآءَ ءَالَ فِرْعَوْنَ ٱلنُّذُرُ
verses.english: And indeed, the warnings ˹also˺ came to the people of Pharaoh.

verses.arabic: كَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا كُلِّهَا فَأَخَذْنَـٰهُمْ أَخْذَ عَزِيزٍ مُّقْتَدِرٍ
verses.english: ˹But˺ they rejected all of Our signs, so We seized them with the ˹crushing˺ grip of the Almighty, Most Powerful.

verses.arabic: أَكُفَّارُكُمْ خَيْرٌ مِّنْ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكُمْ أَمْ لَكُم بَرَآءَةٌ فِى ٱلزُّبُرِ
verses.english: Now, are you ˹Meccan˺ disbelievers superior to those ˹destroyed peoples˺? Or have you ˹been granted˺ immunity ˹from punishment˺ in divine Books?

verses.arabic: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ نَحْنُ جَمِيعٌ مُّنتَصِرٌ
verses.english: Or do they say, “We are all ˹a˺ united ˹front˺, bound to prevail.”?

verses.arabic: سَيُهْزَمُ ٱلْجَمْعُ وَيُوَلُّونَ ٱلدُّبُرَ
verses.english: ˹Soon˺ their united front will be defeated and ˹forced to˺ flee.<sup foot_note=77464>1</sup>

verses.arabic: بَلِ ٱلسَّاعَةُ مَوْعِدُهُمْ وَٱلسَّاعَةُ أَدْهَىٰ وَأَمَرُّ
verses.english: Better yet, the Hour is their appointed time—and the Hour will be most catastrophic and most bitter.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ فِى ضَلَـٰلٍ وَسُعُرٍ
verses.english: Indeed, the wicked are ˹entrenched˺ in misguidance, and ˹are bound for˺ blazes.

verses.arabic: يَوْمَ يُسْحَبُونَ فِى ٱلنَّارِ عَلَىٰ وُجُوهِهِمْ ذُوقُوا۟ مَسَّ سَقَرَ
verses.english: On the Day they will be dragged into the Fire on their faces, ˹they will be told,˺ “Taste the touch of Hell!”<sup foot_note=77465>1</sup>

verses.arabic: إِنَّا كُلَّ شَىْءٍ خَلَقْنَـٰهُ بِقَدَرٍ
verses.english: Indeed, We have created everything, perfectly preordained.

verses.arabic: وَمَآ أَمْرُنَآ إِلَّا وَٰحِدَةٌ كَلَمْحٍۭ بِٱلْبَصَرِ
verses.english: Our command<sup foot_note=77466>1</sup> is but a single word,<sup foot_note=77467>2</sup> done in the blink of an eye.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ أَهْلَكْنَآ أَشْيَاعَكُمْ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
verses.english: We have already destroyed the likes of you. So will any ˹of you˺ be mindful?

verses.arabic: وَكُلُّ شَىْءٍ فَعَلُوهُ فِى ٱلزُّبُرِ
verses.english: Everything they have done is ˹listed˺ in ˹their˺ records.

verses.arabic: وَكُلُّ صَغِيرٍ وَكَبِيرٍ مُّسْتَطَرٌ
verses.english: Every matter, small and large, is written ˹precisely˺.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ فِى جَنَّـٰتٍ وَنَهَرٍ
verses.english: Indeed, the righteous will be amid Gardens and rivers,<sup foot_note=77468>1</sup>

verses.arabic: فِى مَقْعَدِ صِدْقٍ عِندَ مَلِيكٍ مُّقْتَدِرٍۭ
verses.english: at the Seat of Honour in the presence of the Most Powerful Sovereign.
